title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations

For Task A, the response must accurately identify the president who appointed the highest percentage of women to the federal district courts.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe a similarity or difference between Republican and Democratic presidential nominees with regard to the political party of those they nominate.

For Task C, the response must correctly explain how that similarity or difference affects the judicial decisions of the federal district courts with regard to civil liberties.

For Task D, the response must correctly explain how the number and party affiliation of judicial appointments affects presidential influence and power.

The point for each criterion is earned independently.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any one of the tasks set forth by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set forth by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set forth by the question.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set forth by the question.
